quotes.content: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: Im selfish impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can t handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don t deserve me at my best.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.content: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.content: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I m not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: So many books, so little time.
quotes.author: Frank Zappa

quotes.content: A room without books is like a body without a soul.
quotes.author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quotes.content: Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind.
quotes.author: Bernard M. Baruch

quotes.content: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

quotes.content: You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be  hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth.
quotes.author: William W. Purkey

quotes.content: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.
quotes.author: Mae West

quotes.content: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.content: Iam so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.content: To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.content: Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.content: An eye for an eye will only make the whole world blind.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.content: If you can't explain it to a six year old, you don't understand it yourself.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.content: Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein
